attributes.title: We're Going Back to School with Funhaus! | Rooster Teeth
attributes.caption: Chris, Blaine, Elyse and James are heading back to school at Full Sail University to learn how to 3D model! Who do you think will win?
attributes.description:
Chris, Blaine, Elyse and James are heading back to school at Full Sail University to learn how to 3D model! Who do you think will win? 
Thanks to Full Sail University for sponsoring this video. Learn more about Full Sail’s 3D animation programs and how to get started at  http://fullsail.edu/backtoschool
Check out the previous episode right here: https://roosterteeth.com/watch/funhaus-shorts-2020-summerbts
Check out the next episode right here: https://roosterteeth.com/watch/funhaus-shorts-2020-btsfurhaus

attributes.title: The Real Canon Pilot - Spider-Man: Miles Morales
attributes.caption: In this episode, Jon and Charles break down Spider-Man's Miles Morales and touch on the character's origins as well his impact in video games, movies & comics.
attributes.description:
In this episode, Jon and Charles break down Spider-Man's Miles Morales and touch on the character's origins as well his impact in video games, movies & comics.
The Real Canon is a deep dive into the world of genre pop culture, providing backstory and context to what's at the forefront of nerd media. Jon Risinger and co-host Charles Pulliam-Moore together open the gates to everything trending in movies, tv & gaming, offering fresh perspectives on the stories that are defining the canon in real time.
attributes.display_title: The Real Canon Pilot - Spider-Man: Miles Morales
